verbs.description: Previous presidents [V: have] been reluctant to talk about pardons until they 're granted . Not President Trump .
[ARG1: Previous presidents] have [V: been] [ARG2: reluctant to talk about pardons] [ARGM-TMP: until they 're granted] . Not President Trump .
[ARG0: Previous presidents] have been reluctant to [V: talk] [ARG1: about pardons] until they 're granted . Not President Trump .
Previous presidents have been reluctant to talk about pardons until they [V: 're] granted . Not President Trump .
Previous presidents have been reluctant to talk about pardons until [ARG2: they] 're [V: granted] . Not President Trump .
